textBeforeTable: For the next few months, our selections are: Join us for lively, free-flowing discussions. All are welcome! Books discussed are chosen by the group and reflect eclectic and adventuresome interests. For more information, call 303-791-7323 or visit the information desk at the library. The Daytime Book Club meets the first Tuesday of every month at 10 a.m. at James H. LaRue/Highlands Ranch Library.   Book Clubs Highlands Ranch Adult Daytime Book Group Home Get holds and renewal ALERTS through your phone. Here's how... Use our DCL To Go app to access your account, search our catalog, ask a question, or find an event. Donate Now Services
